Premier Bank bụ ụlọ akụ azụmahịa nke Sharia nke onwe ya nke e debanyere aha na Somalia na 2013 ma nye ya ikike site na Central Bank of Somalia na 2014.  Ọ bụ ụlọ akụ mbụ na Somalia iji kwe ka kaadị akwụmụgwọ MasterCard na onye mmekọ na Visa.

Emeghere Premier Bank na Mee 21, 2015 dị ka iwu Sharia si dị site n'aka ndị ọchụnta ego Somalia nkeonwe nwere ahụmịhe ụlọ akụ sitere na South Sudan, Djibouti na Kenya.. Onye bụbu onye isi ala Somalia bụ Hassan Sheikh Mohamud meghere emume mmeghe ụlọ akụ ahụ
Ụlọ akụ ahụ nwere alaka na Mogadishu nakwa na Hargeysa, Somaliland.
Premier Bank na mmekorita ya na MasterCard na SWIFT na-enye ndị ahịa obodo ya maka ọrụ ego ịntanetị zuru ụwa ọnụ.
Onye isi oche Premier Bank Jibril Hassan Mohamud kwupụtara n'oge Mogadishu Tech Summit 2018 ego nke otu nde dollar maka mmalite teknụzụ Somalia.
